text: Three Wise Guys is a 2005 American television movie. It is directed by Robert Iscove and starring Eddie McClintock, Jodi Lyn O'Keefe, Judd Nelson, Nicholas Turturro, Roddy Piper, Tom Arnold and Katey Sagal. ==Plot== This Christmas movie is a comedy about the mistress of the owner of Royal Crown Casino in Las Vegas. She and her boyfriend have stolen a disc containing financial irregularities in the casino. Murray Crown, the owner of the casino, hires three killers to find Stella and her boyfriend and retrieve the disc. ==Production== Filming took place in Albuquerque, New Mexico. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2005 comedy films Category:2005 television films Category:2005 films Category:American Christmas comedy films Category:American films Category:Films based on short fiction Category:Films shot in New Mexico Category:Gambling films Category:USA Network original films Category:Christmas television films Category:Films directed by Robert Iscove Category:2000s Christmas comedy films
title: Three Wise Guys
